verse.name: v1
verse.lines: Lord of our life, and God of our salvation, Star of our night, and Hope of every nation, Hear and receive Thy church's supplication, Lord God Almighty.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: See round Thine Ark the hungry billows curling! See how Thy foes their banners are unfurling! Lord, while their darts envenomed they are hurling, Thou canst preserve us.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: Lord, Thou canst help when earthly armor faileth; Lord, Thou canst save when sin itself assaileth; Lord, o'er Thy Rock nor death nor hell prevaileth; Grant us Thy peace, Lord.

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: Peace, in our hearts, our evil thoughts assuaging, Peace, in Thy Church, where brothers are engaging, Peace, when the world its busy war is waging; Calm Thy foes raging!

verse.name: v5
verse.lines: Grant us Thy help till backward they are driven; Grant them Thy Truth, that they may be forgiven; Grant peace on earth, and after we have striven, Peace in Thy Heaven.
